attributes.action: Create a space on ballot papers showing "none of the above"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many elections none of the candidates standing are acceptable to the voter. A vote is therefore cast on the "best of a bad lot" basis.

I wish a box showing "NONE OF THE ABOVE" WHICH A VOTER CAN TICK TO SHOW THEIR DISAPPROVAL OF THE CHOICE OF AVAILABLE CANDIDATES.

This could help prevent political trickery in "MANAGING and PROMOTING" CANDIDATES UNFAIRLY OVER MINORITY PARTIES BY WAY OF UNFAIR PRESS TREATMENT. 

IT COULD ALSO HELP PREVENT ANY INTERFERENCE OF THE VOTERS RIGHT TO SECRET VOTING WITH THEIR OWN CONSCIENCE FROM THE STATE, RELIGIOUS GROUPS, EMPLOYERS AND UNIONS.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
